casebody.data:
Supreme Court — Appellate Term, October, 1898.

Before Beekman, P. J., Gildersleeve and Giegerich, JJ.

Max Friedman, respondent v. The Consolidated Traction Co., appellant. Appeal from a judgment of the General Term of the City. Court, affirming a judgment of that court in favor of plaintiff. Jarvis N. Atkinson (Spencer Weart, of counsel), for appellant; Julius H. Cohn, for respondent.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
